text: Bolotana (Olòthene, Bolòtzana) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Nuoro in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,618 people lived there. Its area is 108.44 km². It is 472 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Nuoro
title: Bolotana
